attributes.action: let the Project Reality team continue with their work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a stand against the Anti Terror laws that have sunk to a new low by suspending work on Project Reality due to the Anti Terror laws. Those not familiar go to www.realitymod.com and read it. PR is a game mod which does no harm to anyone and should not be suspended under the MOD. This is wrong and i urge you to help free this innocent game(mod - which is free!!!!) attacked by this vile, unneeded law.
